extensionDescription.message: Customizable mouse gesture addon, which supports over 50 different commands.
extensionDescription.description: Customizable mouse gesture addon, which supports over 50 different commands.

addonUpdateNotificationMessage.message: The new version number is $VERSION$. Click here to view the changelog.
addonUpdateNotificationMessage.description: The new version number is $VERSION$. Click here to view the changelog.

settingDescriptionMouseButton.message: The mouse button which will trigger the gesture.
settingDescriptionMouseButton.description: The mouse button which will trigger the gesture.

settingDescriptionTimeoutActive.message: Cancels the gesture after the mouse has not been moved for the specified time.
settingDescriptionTimeoutActive.description: Cancels the gesture after the mouse has not been moved for the specified time.

settingDescriptionTimeoutDuration.message: The duration in seconds until the gesture is cancelled.
settingDescriptionTimeoutDuration.description: The duration in seconds until the gesture is cancelled.

settingDescriptionSuppressionKey.message: Disables the mouse gesture if the key is pressed.
settingDescriptionSuppressionKey.description: Disables the mouse gesture if the key is pressed.

settingDescriptionDistanceThreshold.message: The minimum mouse distance until the gesture gets activated.
settingDescriptionDistanceThreshold.description: The minimum mouse distance until the Gesture gets activated.

settingDescriptionDistanceSensitivity.message: The minimum mouse distance until a new direction gets recognized. This will also impact the trace smoothness.
settingDescriptionDistanceSensitivity.description: The minimum mouse distance until a new direction gets recognized. This will also impact the trace smoothness.

settingDescriptionDisplayTrace.message: Draws a trace to display the mouse movement.
settingDescriptionDisplayTrace.description: Draws a trace to display the mouse movement.

settingDescriptionTraceOpacity.message: Accepts any value in the range of 0 (invisible) and 1 (visible).
settingDescriptionTraceOpacity.description: Accepts any value in the range of 0 (invisible) and 1 (visible).

settingDescriptionTraceGrowth.message: The amount of pixels that the line will grow until the maximum line width. No growth if it is set equal to the line width.
settingDescriptionTraceGrowth.description: The amount of pixels that the line will grow until the maximum line width. No growth if it is set equal to the line width.

settingDescriptionDisplayCommand.message: Displays an command matching the current gesture if available.
settingDescriptionDisplayCommand.description: Displays an command matching the current gesture if available.

settingDescriptionCommandBackgroundOpaci.message: Accepts any value in the range of 0 (invisible) and 1 (visible).
settingDescriptionCommandBackgroundOpaci.description: Accepts any value in the range of 0 (invisible) and 1 (visible).

settingDescriptionCommandFontSize.message: Accepts every CSS Unit like: em, px, pt, %, vh etc.
settingDescriptionCommandFontSize.description: Accepts every CSS Unit like: em, px, pt, %, vh etc.

settingDescriptionDisplayDirections.message: Displays the encoding of the gesture as arrows at the bottom of the screen.
settingDescriptionDisplayDirections.description: Displays the encoding of the gesture as arrows at the bottom of the screen.

settingDescriptionDirectionsFontSize.message: Accepts every CSS Unit like: em, px, pt, %, vh etc.
settingDescriptionDirectionsFontSize.description: Accepts every CSS Unit like: em, px, pt, %, vh etc.

settingDescriptionDirectionsBackgroundOp.message: Accepts any value in the range of 0 (invisible) and 1 (visible).
settingDescriptionDirectionsBackgroundOp.description: Accepts any value in the range of 0 (invisible) and 1 (visible).

settingDescriptionUpdateNotification.message: Show a notification when Gesturefy is updated.
settingDescriptionUpdateNotification.description: Show a notification when Gesturefy is updated.

settingDescriptionScrollDuration.message: Duration in milliseconds for scroll top/bottom.
settingDescriptionScrollDuration.description: Duration in milliseconds for scroll top/bottom.

settingDescriptionScrollPageDuration.message: Duration in milliseconds for scroll page up/down.
settingDescriptionScrollPageDuration.description: Duration in milliseconds for scroll page up/down.

settingDescriptionNewTabOnEmptyLink.message: Determines if an empty tab should be opened if no URL was selected.
settingDescriptionNewTabOnEmptyLink.description: Determines if an empty tab should be opened if no URL was selected.

settingDescriptionFocusImageToNewTab.message: Determines if the opened tab containing the image should gain focus or not.
settingDescriptionFocusImageToNewTab.description: Determines if the opened tab containing the image should gain focus or not.

settingDescriptionSearchEngineURL.message: The URL to query a search by appending the search text to the end.
settingDescriptionSearchEngineURL.description: The URL to query a search by appending the search text to the end.

settingDescriptionFocusSearchResult.message: Defines if the search result should gain focus or not.
settingDescriptionFocusSearchResult.description: Defines if the search result should gain focus or not.

settingDescriptionRemoveTabFocus.message: Defines which tab should gain focus.
settingDescriptionRemoveTabFocus.description: Defines which tab should gain focus.

settingDescriptionRemovePinnedTabs.message: Defines if pinned tabs can be removed or not.
settingDescriptionRemovePinnedTabs.description: Defines if pinned tabs can be removed or not.

settingDescriptionNewTabPosition.message: Defines where the newly created tab should be inserted.
settingDescriptionNewTabPosition.description: Defines where the newly created tab should be inserted.

settingDescriptionZoomStep.message: The zoom in/out step in percentage. If left blank, the default zoom levels are used.
settingDescriptionZoomStep.description: The zoom in/out step in percentage. If left blank, the default zoom levels are used.

settingDescriptionPromptSaveImageAs.message: Defines if the "Save As" dialog should appear or the image should be downloaded silently to the users default download folder.
settingDescriptionPromptSaveImageAs.description: Defines if the "Save As" dialog should appear or the image should be downloaded silently to the users default download folder.

settingDescriptionFirstTabIncludePinned.message: Defines if pinned tabs should be treated as the leftmost tabs.
settingDescriptionFirstTabIncludePinned.description: Defines if pinned tabs should be treated as the leftmost tabs.

explanationBlacklistText.message: Here you can add web pages on which no gesture functions should be executed. After adding you can edit and delete them again. To include more URL paths, please use '/*' at the end of the URL, for example: google.com/*
explanationBlacklistText.description: Here you can add web pages on which no gesture functions should be executed. After adding you can edit and delete them again. To include more URL paths, please use '/*' at the end of the URL, for example: google.com/*

explanationGesturesText.message: Only one gesture per command can be used. The gesture codes are composed of U - up, D - down, R - right, L - left and cannot contain the same direction twice in a row, as for example RR.
explanationGesturesText.description: Only one gesture per command can be used. The gesture codes are composed of U - up, D - down, R - right, L - left and cannot contain the same direction twice in a row, as for example RR.

commandDescriptionStopLoading.message: Stops the current page from loading.
commandDescriptionStopLoading.description: Stops the current page from loading.

commandDescriptionZoomOut.message: Zooms out of the current tab.
commandDescriptionZoomOut.description: Zooms out of the current tab.

commandDescriptionPageBack.message: Returns to the previous page of the history.
commandDescriptionPageBack.description: Returns to the previous page of the history.

commandDescriptionPageForth.message: Goes a page forward in the history.
commandDescriptionPageForth.description: Goes a page forward in the history.

commandDescriptionTogglePin.message: Pins or unpins the current Tab.
commandDescriptionTogglePin.description: Pins or unpins the current Tab.

commandDescriptionToggleMute.message: Mutes or unmutes the current tab.
commandDescriptionToggleMute.description: Mutes or unmutes the current tab.

commandDescriptionScrollTop.message: Scrolls to the top of the page.
commandDescriptionScrollTop.description: Scrolls to the top of the page.

commandDescriptionScrollBottom.message: Scrolls to the bottom of the page.
commandDescriptionScrollBottom.description: Scrolls to the bottom of the page.

commandDescriptionScrollPageDown.message: Scrolls down by the length of the current view.
commandDescriptionScrollPageDown.description: Scrolls down by the length of the current view.

commandDescriptionScrollPageUp.message: Scrolls up by the length of the current view.
commandDescriptionScrollPageUp.description: Scrolls up by the length of the current view.

commandDescriptionFocusRightTab.message: Switches to the right tab of the current tab.
commandDescriptionFocusRightTab.description: Switches to the right tab of the current tab.

commandDescriptionFocusLeftTab.message: Switches to the left tab of the current tab.
commandDescriptionFocusLeftTab.description: Switches to the left tab of the current tab.

commandDescriptionFocusFirstTab.message: Switches to the far left tab.
commandDescriptionFocusFirstTab.description: Switches to the far left tab.

commandDescriptionFocusLastTab.message: Switches to the far right tab.
commandDescriptionFocusLastTab.description: Switches to the far right tab.

commandDescriptionFocusPreviousSelectedT.message: Switches to the last active tab.
commandDescriptionFocusPreviousSelectedT.description: Switches to the last active tab.

commandDescriptionToggleWindowSize.message: Switches between maximized and normal window size.
commandDescriptionToggleWindowSize.description: Switches between maximized and normal window size.

commandDescriptionToggleFullscreen.message: Activates or deactivates full screen mode.
commandDescriptionToggleFullscreen.description: Activates or deactivates full screen mode.

commandDescriptionNewPrivateWindow.message: Opens a new empty private window.
commandDescriptionNewPrivateWindow.description: Opens a new empty private window.

commandDescriptionTabToNewWindow.message: Moves the current tab to a new window.
commandDescriptionTabToNewWindow.description: Moves the current tab to a new window.

commandDescriptionURLLevelUp.message: Goes up the URL hierarchy for one level.
commandDescriptionURLLevelUp.description: Goes up the URL hierarchy for one level.

commandDescriptionIncreaseURLNumber.message: Increases a number in the URL.
commandDescriptionIncreaseURLNumber.description: Increases a number in the URL.

commandDescriptionDecreaseURLNumber.message: Decreases a number in the URL.
commandDescriptionDecreaseURLNumber.description: Decreases a number in the URL.

commandDescriptionImageToNewTab.message: Opens the image, where the gesture started, in a new tab.
commandDescriptionImageToNewTab.description: Opens the image, where the gesture started, in a new tab.

commandDescriptionLinkToNewTab.message: Opens either a selected link, or the link where the gesture started, in a new foreground tab.
commandDescriptionLinkToNewTab.description: Opens either a selected link, or the link where the gesture started, in a new foreground tab.

commandDescriptionLinkToNewWindow.message: Opens either a selected link, or the link where the gesture started, in a new window.
commandDescriptionLinkToNewWindow.description: Opens either a selected link, or the link where the gesture started, in a new window.

commandDescriptionLinkToNewPrivateWindow.message: Opens either a selected link, or the link where the gesture started, in a new private window.
commandDescriptionLinkToNewPrivateWindow.description: Opens either a selected link, or the link where the gesture started, in a new private window.

commandDescriptionSearchSelection.message: Starts a web search of the selected text.
commandDescriptionSearchSelection.description: Starts a web search of the selected text.

commandDescriptionCloseRightTabs.message: Removes all tabs to the right side.
commandDescriptionCloseRightTabs.description: Removes all tabs to the right side.

commandDescriptionCloseLeftTabs.message: Removes all tabs to the left side, excluding pinned tabs.
commandDescriptionCloseLeftTabs.description: Removes all tabs to the left side, excluding pinned tabs.

commandDescriptionCloseOtherTabs.message: Remove all tabs except of the current tab and pinned tabs.
commandDescriptionCloseOtherTabs.description: Remove all tabs except of the current tab and pinned tabs.

commandDescriptionSaveTabAsPDF.message: Saves the current page as a pdf file.
commandDescriptionSaveTabAsPDF.description: Saves the current page as a pdf file.

commandDescriptionSaveImage.message: Downloads the image, where the gesture started.
commandDescriptionSaveImage.description: Downloads the image, where the gesture started.

commandDescriptionPrintTab.message: Prints the current page by prompting the print dialog.
commandDescriptionPrintTab.description: Prints the current page by prompting the print dialog.

commandDescriptionOpenPrintPreview.message: Opens the print preview of the current page.
commandDescriptionOpenPrintPreview.description: Opens the print preview of the current page.

commandDescriptionOpenLink.message: Opens either a selected link, or the link where the gesture started.
commandDescriptionOpenLink.description: Opens either a selected link, or the link where the gesture started.

commandDescriptionOpenImage.message: Opens the image where the gesture started. (View Image)
commandDescriptionOpenImage.description: Opens the image where the gesture started. (View Image)

commandDescriptionLinkToNewBookmark.message: Saves either a selected link, or the link where the gesture started, as a bookmark.
commandDescriptionLinkToNewBookmark.description: Saves either a selected link, or the link where the gesture started, as a bookmark.

commandDescriptionSaveScreenshot.message: Saves the current visible website area as an image.
commandDescriptionSaveScreenshot.description: Saves the current visible website area as an image.

commandDescriptionCopyTabURL.message: Copies the URL of the current tab to clipboard.
commandDescriptionCopyTabURL.description: Copies the URL of the current tab to clipboard.

commandDescriptionCopyLinkURL.message: Copies either a selected url, or the link where the gesture started to clipboard.
commandDescriptionCopyLinkURL.description: Copies either a selected url, or the link where the gesture started to clipboard.

commandDescriptionCopyTextSelection.message: Copies the current text selection to clipboard.
commandDescriptionCopyTextSelection.description: Copies the current text selection to clipboard.

commandDescriptionCopyImage.message: Copies the image, where the gesture started, to clipboard.
commandDescriptionCopyImage.description: Copies the image, where the gesture started, to clipboard.

commandDescriptionViewPageSourceCode.message: Opens a new tab containing the source code of the page.
commandDescriptionViewPageSourceCode.description: Opens a new tab containing the source code of the page.

commandDescriptionPopupAllTabs.message: Opens a popup containing a list of all currently open tabs and offers the possibility to switch to one of them.
commandDescriptionPopupAllTabs.description: Opens a popup containing a list of all currently open tabs and offers the possibility to switch to one of them.

commandDescriptionPopupRecentlyClosedTab.message: Opens a popup containing a list of all recently closed tabs and offers the possibility to restore one of them.
commandDescriptionPopupRecentlyClosedTab.description: Opens a popup containing a list of all recently closed tabs and offers the possibility to restore one of them.

extraDescriptionRockerActive.message: This gesture is performed either by holding the right mouse button and clicking the left or vice versa.
extraDescriptionRockerActive.description: This gesture is performed either by holding the right mouse button and clicking the left or vice versa.

extraDescriptionWheelActive.message: Scroll up or down while holding the wheel gesture button.
extraDescriptionWheelActive.description: Scroll up or down while holding the wheel gesture button.

extraDescriptionWheelMouseButton.message: The mouse button which will trigger the wheel gesture.
extraDescriptionWheelMouseButton.description: The mouse button which will trigger the wheel gesture.

gestureInputNotificationInUse.message: This gesture is already in use by the "$ACTION$" command.
gestureInputNotificationInUse.description: This gesture is already in use by the "$ACTION$" command.

aboutRestoreNotificationWrongFile.message: The selected file does not match the required file type.
aboutRestoreNotificationWrongFile.description: The selected file does not match the required file type.

aboutResetNotificationConfirm.message: All settings including gestures are reset. This cannot be undone!
aboutResetNotificationConfirm.description: All settings including gestures are reset. This cannot be undone!
